Eleventy Netlify Boilerplate

Welcome

This is a template for building a simple blog website with the Eleventy static site generator, with deployment to Netlify.

Includes Netlify CMS for WYSIWYG content editing, and Netlify Forms for processing your site's form data.

For more info on installation and usage, view the project repo on GitHub.

Or click the button below to deploy your own copy of this project to Netlify.

This project is maintained by Dan Urbanowicz. Check out the GitHub repo.
